text: Jisasɨ 3.10 Mt 9.20-21, 14.36, Mk 5.29, 6.56, Lu 7.20-21 kulaŋ iamɨgali akape hɨmiŋ hɨmiŋ daŋ agɨladɨ ukaci lamadami. Haman saja kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨmiŋ hɨmiŋ daŋ agɨlaŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨhɨle agɨladɨ lɨbɨnikɨlanikɨlaŋ uavɨdami. Jisasɨ dɨ hadihɨbɨ agadɨ mɨŋaiga alaŋ ukaci iakɨbalɨlu aba haman lɨhavɨdami.
